verse.name: c1
verse.lines: It is joy unspeakable and full of glory, newline Full of glory, full of glory. newline It is joy unspeakable and full of glory. newline Oh the half has never yet been told!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I have found His grace in all complete; newline He supplieth every need. newline While I sit and learn at Jesus feet, newline I am free, yes, free indeed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I have found the pleasure I once craved; newline It is joy and peace within. newline What a wondrous blessing! I am saved newline From the awful gulf of sin.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I have found that hope newline so bright and clear, newline Living in the realm of grace. newline Oh the Savior's presence is so near, newline I can see His smiling face.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I have found the joy no tongue can tell. newline How its waves of glory roll! newline It is like a great o'er flowing well newline Springing up within my soul.
